name: Carnevil
flavorText: Near the shoreline of the Torajan Jungle lies Lake Ymirson. Here are found the palms from which the Umbaru derive the poison for their darts. This ornate mask is carved from one of these palms, and beads of poisonous sap ooze forth from it, providing the witch doctor wearing it with easy access to fresh, and more concentrated, venom.
flavorTextHtml: Near the shoreline of the Torajan Jungle lies Lake Ymirson. Here are found the palms from which the Umbaru derive the poison for their darts. This ornate mask is carved from one of these palms, and beads of poisonous sap ooze forth from it, providing the witch doctor wearing it with easy access to fresh, and more concentrated, venom.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: The 10 Fetishes closest to you will shoot a powerful Poison Dart every time you do. (Witch Doctor Only)
secondary.text: The 10 Fetishes closest to you will shoot a powerful Poison Dart every time you do. (Witch Doctor Only)
